title: Need help compiling a list of Yoga Festivals from 1 November 2016 to 31 December 2017
snippet:
I need you to scour the internet for yoga festivals from 1 November 2016 to 31 December 2017.

I have attached a spreadsheet that you will need to fill out. It is important to try and find reputable yoga festivals (the more professional they look via the website the better eg. Wunderlust). Look all over the world, however please start your focus in the US first. 

If you have an active interest in yoga this is favoured.
